verses.verse: <S%H7637><s%>"'In the seventh month, <S%H2320><s%> on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> you shall have a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work: <S%H4399><s%> it is a day <S%H3117><s%> of blowing of trumpets to you. <S%H8643><s%>

You shall offer <S%H6213><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bull, <S%H6499><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

and their meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for the bull, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for the ram, <S%H352><s%>
and one <S%H259><s%> tenth part <S%H6241><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs; <S%H3532><s%>
and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> to make atonement for you; <S%H3722><s%>

besides the burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> of the new moon, <S%H2320><s%> and the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of it, <S%H8548><s%> and the continual burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> and the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of it, <S%H5262><s%> and their drink offerings, according to their ordinance, <S%H4941><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma, <S%H7381><s%> an offering made by fire <S%H801><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>

<S%H6218><s%>"'On the tenth day of this seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> you shall have a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> and you shall afflict <S%H6031><s%> your souls: <S%H5315><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no kind of work; <S%H4399><s%>

but you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5930><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> for a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma: <S%H7381><s%> one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bull, <S%H6499><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H8141><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old; <S%H8549><s%> they shall be to you without blemish;

and their meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for the bull, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for the one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%>
a tenth part <S%H6241><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs: <S%H3532><s%>

one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin offering; <S%H2403><s%> besides the sin offering <S%H2403><s%> of atonement, <S%H3725><s%> and the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the meal offering <S%H5930><s%> of it, <S%H4503><s%> and their drink offerings.

<S%H2568><s%>"'On the fifteenth day <S%H3117><s%> of the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> you shall have a holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> and you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> a feast <S%H2282><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%>

and you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> thirteen <S%H7969><s%> young <S%H1241><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old; <S%H8549><s%> they shall be without blemish;

and their meal offering, <S%H4503><s%> fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mixed <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> bull <S%H6499><s%> of the thirteen <S%H7969><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tenth parts <S%H6241><s%> for each <S%H259><s%> ram <S%H352><s%> of the two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%>
and a tenth part <S%H6241><s%> for every <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> of the fourteen <S%H702><s%> lambs; <S%H3532><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H2403><s%> the meal offering <S%H2403><s%> of it, <S%H5262><s%> and the drink offering of it.

<S%H8145><s%>"'On the second day <S%H3117><s%> you shall offer twelve <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

and their meal offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> after the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering; <S%H2403><s%> besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the meal offering <S%H5930><s%> of it, <S%H4503><s%> and their drink offerings.

<S%H7992><s%>"'On the third day <S%H3117><s%> eleven <S%H6249><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

and their meal offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> after the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin offering; <S%H2403><s%> besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the meal offering <S%H5930><s%> of it, <S%H5262><s%> and the drink offering of it.

<S%H7243><s%>"'On the fourth day <S%H3117><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

their meal offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> after the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male <S%H8163><s%> goat <S%H5795><s%> for a sin offering; <S%H2403><s%> besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H2403><s%> the meal offering <S%H2403><s%> of it, <S%H5262><s%> and the drink offering of it.

<S%H2549><s%>"'On the fifth day <S%H3117><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

and their meal offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> after the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> and the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of it, <S%H5262><s%> and the drink offering of it.

<S%H8345><s%>"'On the sixth day <S%H3117><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

and their meal offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> after the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin offering; <S%H2403><s%> besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of it, <S%H5262><s%> and the drink offerings of it.

<S%H7637><s%>"'On the seventh day <S%H3117><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> bulls, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> rams, <S%H352><s%> fourteen <S%H702><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

and their meal offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bulls, <S%H6499><s%> for the rams, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> after the ordinance; <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin offering; <S%H2403><s%> besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> the meal offering <S%H4503><s%> of it, <S%H5262><s%> and the drink offering of it.
<S%H8066><s%>"'On the eighth day <S%H3117><s%> you shall have a solemn assembly: <S%H6116><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no servile <S%H5656><s%> work; <S%H4399><s%>

but you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt offering, <S%H5930><s%> an offering made by fire, <S%H801><s%> of a pleasant <S%H5207><s%> aroma <S%H7381><s%> to Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> one <S%H259><s%> bull, <S%H6499><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> male lambs <S%H3532><s%> a <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> old without blemish; <S%H8549><s%>

their meal offering <S%H4503><s%> and their drink offerings <S%H5262><s%> for the bull, <S%H6499><s%> for the ram, <S%H352><s%> and for the lambs, <S%H3532><s%> shall be according to their number, <S%H4557><s%> after the ordinance: <S%H4941><s%>

and one <S%H259><s%> male goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin offering, <S%H2403><s%> besides the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt offering, <S%H2403><s%> and the meal offering <S%H5930><s%> of it, <S%H5262><s%> and the drink offering of it.

<S%H6213><s%>"'You shall offer these to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in your set feasts, <S%H4150><s%> besides your vows, <S%H5088><s%> and your freewill offerings, <S%H5071><s%> for your burnt offerings, <S%H5930><s%> and for your meal offerings, <S%H4503><s%> and for your drink offerings, <S%H5262><s%> and for your peace offerings. <S%H8002><s%>'"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> told <S%H559><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
